meanings: (일하지 않다) idle away, be idle, (informal) loaf around; (실직하다) be out of work[a job], have no job[work], be jobless[unemployed]

vlive.korean: 놀아보자! Let's have fun! 듣기 View video ATEEZ : [FULL] ATEEZ(에이티즈) ONLINE ATINY PARTY [Crescent]

examples.korean: Don’t be such a drip—come and join in the fun! 발음듣기 그렇게 따분하게 굴지 말고 와서 함께 재미있게 놀아! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t be such a drip—come and join in the fun! 발음

examples.korean: Do you have FOGO or something? Please go out and have fun! 발음듣기 너 무슨 사교모임 공포증이라도 있니? 나가서 좀 놀아! 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Do you have FOGO or something? Please go out and have fun! 발음

examples.korean: Going out every weekend and having no money to pay your bills = being irresponsible. 발음듣기 고지서 낼 돈도 없으면서 주말마다 나가 놀아 = 책임감 결여. DARAKWON
examples.english: Going out every weekend and having no money to pay your bills = being irresponsible. 발음

examples.korean: Let's go out and have some fun. 발음듣기 나가서 좀 놀아 보자. Neungyule
examples.english: Let's go out and have some fun. 발음

examples.korean: Wolves protect their pups well, but play with them, too. 발음듣기 늑대들은 새끼들을 잘 보호하고 같이 놀아 주기도 해요. Neungyule
examples.english: Wolves protect their pups well, but play with them, too. 발음
